ai-patthana12.7:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.7:1.1_1: or cause or reasons not give rise to the teaching,
ai-patthana12.7:2.1_1: or cause or reasons not give rise to the teaching,
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_0: Not for the sake of cause or reason, not for the sake of cause or reason, nor for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_1: Not for the sake of cause or reason, not for the sake of cause or reason, nor for the sake of a cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_2: without cause or reason, without cause or reason,
ai-patthana12.7:3.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana12.7:4.1_0: ‘... for the sake of nine objects.’ ...
ai-patthana12.7:6.1_0: You should definitively regard them as unspecified to all.
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_0: It’s not because of disrespect that someone doesn’t give a teaching.
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_1: It is not possible for the sake of worldly because of roots and fruits,
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_2: Not for the sake of another, or for the sake of health and for the sake of a teaching.
ai-patthana12.7:9.1_3: Not for the sake of (of the teaching), nor for the sake of a someone who is not skilled in teaching.
ai-patthana12.7:10.1_2: This is the section in brief.
